text: Muhammad Taufiq Kiemas (31 December 1942 â€“ 8 June 2013) was the Speaker of the People's Consultative Assembly of Indonesia from 2009 until his death in 2013. Taufiq (sometimes spelt Taufik) was the husband of Megawati Sukarnoputri, President of Indonesia from 2001 to 2004. Kiemas died on 8 June 2013 in Singapore General Hospital, Singapore after a heart attack, aged 70.'Body of Megawati's husband leaves embassy for Indonesia', The Straits Times, 9 June 2013. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Indonesia
title: Taufiq Kiemas
